title: Best of The Herd for Feb 21, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 21, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and thinks the Cowboys trading up for Tua Tagovailoa not only isn't crazy but actually makes sense. He says all of these rumors about where Tom Brady will sign makes him think he's even more likely to stay with the Patriots. Plus, NBA Champion Tony Allen talks with Doug about Kobe Bryant, if the Rockets can win and which LA team he thinks has a better shot at winning the title.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
